member.name: IP_INTERFACE_INFO
member.summary: TheIP_INTERFACE_INFO structure contains a list of the network interface adapters with IPv4 enabled on the local system.

member.name: IP_INTERFACE_INFO.NumAdapters
member.summary: The number of adapters listed in the array pointed to by the Adapter member.

member.name: IP_INTERFACE_INFO.Adapter
member.summary: An array of structures. Each structure maps an adapter index to that adapter's name. The adapter index may change when an adapter is disabled and then enabled, or under other circumstances, and should not be considered persistent.
